article:
This is a 'list' of 'notable [[Belgian people]]' who either: *'are' or 'were
[[Belgian nationality law|Belgian citizen]]s' during at least one period of
their life, *'were born in [[Belgium]]' or in the provinces of present-day
Belgium, but who were not or are not Belgian citizens (either because Belgium
did not exist at the time of their life or because they had or have another
citizenship). The names of people of this category are italicized.

The list also comprises *fictional characters who are undisputedly Belgians
*important ones whose citizenship is unknown or not Belgian and with Belgian
creators. The names of fictional characters of this category are italicized.

'The same person may appear under several headings.'
